tasks.label: Run All Benchmarks
tasks.detail: Executes the full set of benchmarks and saves results to a timestamped directory.

tasks.label: Run Debug Benchmark
tasks.detail: Executes only the debug benchmark suite for rapid testing.

tasks.label: Run ADK Benchmarks: fix_error suite only
tasks.detail: Executes benchmarks for pure Python ADK-based agents (ADK_ prefix).

tasks.label: Run ADK Benchmarks: api_understanding suite only
tasks.detail: Executes benchmarks for API Understanding suite only.

tasks.label: Run GeminiCliPodman Benchmarks: All suites
tasks.detail: Executes benchmarks for all ADK-based agents.

tasks.label: Run Debug ADK Benchmark
tasks.detail: Executes only the debug benchmark suite for ADK-based agents.

tasks.label: Regenerate Generator Internals Docs
tasks.detail: Updates benchmarks/generator_internals.md based on current code definitions.

tasks.label: Run All Tests
tasks.detail: Runs all pytest tests located in the benchmarks and tools directories.

tasks.label: Unit/Integration Tests
tasks.detail: Runs only the unit and integration tests, excluding other test files.

tasks.label: Integration Test: Unified Generators
tasks.detail: Runs the specific integration test for unified generators.

tasks.label: Integration Test: ADK-based Generators
tasks.command: env/bin/python -m pytest -v --import-mode=importlib benchmarks/tests/integration/test_unified_generators.py -k "structured_workflow_adk_test_case or workflow_adk_test_case or adk_agent_test_case"
tasks.detail: Runs unified integration tests, filtered for ADK-based generators.

tasks.label: Profile Integration Tests
tasks.detail: Runs integration tests with profiling enabled.

tasks.label: Rebuild Docker Images using Podman (Local)
tasks.detail: Rebuilds all local Gemini CLI Docker images using Podman.

tasks.label: Viewer
tasks.detail: Starts the Streamlit app to view benchmark results and history.

tasks.label: Run VibeShare Analysis & Visualization
tasks.command: env/bin/python -m vibeshare.analyze_vibeshare && env/bin/python -m papermill vibeshare/visualization.ipynb vibeshare/visualization.ipynb
tasks.detail: Runs VibeShare analysis and updates the visualization notebook in-place.

tasks.label: Index Co-occurrence Data
tasks.detail: Generates the co-occurrence matrix from local adk-python integration tests and samples.

tasks.label: Recalculate API Usage Stats
tasks.detail: Regenerates usage frequency stats for ADK APIs using local tests and samples.

tasks.label: Regenerate Codebase Knowledge (Targets & Embeddings)
tasks.detail: Regenerates ranked_targets.yaml and builds the semantic vector embeddings (.npy).

tasks.label: Check Registry Updates
tasks.detail: Interactively checks and installs updates for registered repositories.

tasks.label: Agentic: Generate Execution MCQ (Gemini 3 Pro)
tasks.command: PYTHONPATH=. env/bin/python benchmarks/generator/benchmark_generator/run_generator.py --type agentic_adk --output-dir benchmarks/benchmark_definitions/agentic_generated --model-name gemini-3-pro-preview --repo-path ../adk-python --concurrency 3 --session-db data/agentic_sessions.db --namespace google.adk --cooccurrence-file ai/instructions/knowledge/adk_cooccurrence.json --mode execution_mcq
tasks.detail: Generates repository-specific execution benchmarks using Gemini 3 Pro (High Quality).

tasks.label: Generate Executive Report (Latest Run)
tasks.detail: Generates a comprehensive log_analysis.md using Map-Reduce LLM analysis.

tasks.label: Maintain Knowledge Base
tasks.detail: Serially checks for registry updates and then regenerates local codebase knowledge.
